description: This table contains data about patient reported anti-coagulants.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_RPTD_ANTICOAG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores patient reported anti-coagulants


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ANTICOAG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of patient reported anti-coagulant


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ANTICOAG_NUM_DAYS_BEF_TO_STOP
columns.description: The number of days before surgery the patient should stop taking the anti-coagulant
